title: Portfolio
extendedDescription: A dynamic personal portfolio built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, leveraging the GitHub API to showcase selected projects. The portfolio automatically fetches public repositories, filters those with specific display configurations, and presents them in an theme-aware interface.

features.name: Dynamic Showcase
features.description: Automatically fetches and displays GitHub repositories with custom configurations.

features.name: Interactive Previews
features.description: Modal-based README viewing with background loading for optimal performance.
